TOP_LEVEL_OR_OBJECT_ONLY: The {1} function can only be declared at the top level of a file or within an object class.
MUST_USE_ONE_OF_ANNOTATIONS: The {2} parameter of the {1} function must use one of the annotations in {3}.
ONLY_USE_ONE_OF_ANNOTATIONS: The {2} parameter of the {1} function is restricted to use only one of the annotations in {3}.
